script:
#!/bin/bash set -e
scp -q -o StrictHostKeyChecking=no root@%{fqdn}:/etc/sysconfig/iptables $(dirname "$0")
ports=$(while read line; do ports="$ports $(echo $line | grep -Eoe "--dport [[:digit:]]+" | grep -Eoe "[[:digit:]]+")"; done < $(dirname "$0")/iptables; echo "$ports")
endpoints=$(/usr/bin/azure vm endpoint list %{hostname} --json | grep -o 'Port.*' | grep -Eoe "[[:digit:]]+") || (echo "ERROR: no endpoints found"; exit 1)
for port in $ports; do if ! [[ $endpoints == *$port* ]]; then azure vm endpoint create %{hostname} $port $port fi done
